channel.title: Merch on Projektemacher
channel.description: Recent content in Merch on Projektemacher

item.title: All seeing WiFi
item.description: A warning sign that combines the WiFi symbol and the all-seeing eye . In the unlikely event that the hotspots are tracking you….

item.title: Der praktische Hynotiseuer
item.description: The book “Der praktische Hypnotiseur Anleitung zum Hypnotisieren sowie zur Erteilung von Suggestionen zu Heil- u. Erziehungszwecken” by Reinhold Gerling was a bestseller, as can be seen from the number of copies.

item.title: Wir wollen nur eure Seele
item.description: This book by Ulrich BÃ¤umer warns against the dangers of “occult” rock music. All in all it is an amusing evangelical work of art in parts. Much of what you can read there seems familiar as an urban legend if you already lived in the 80s or early 90s.
